name: Trapped in Time
description:
It's a catastrophe! Time as we know it is falling apart! Everyone is stuck in a time loop, repeating the same 20 seconds over and over. Play as Viktor and collect resources to repair the time tear and bring order back to our world.

When you run out of time, you lose everything...except the permanent upgrades that you've obtained.

Enter a unique name, which affects the randomization of the level generation but still is consistent if you use the same one.

This project was created for the Global Game Jam 2020, following the theme of "Repair".

This current version has been updated to feature better collision detection, re-balancing, better progression to the upgrades and minor adjustments and tweaks to help making navigation a bit smoother.

We decided to use the "diversifiers" in the game jam. beat the game in 20 seconds, and have the name affect the game play.

-

Major changes in 1.1

Repairing Tear unlocks upgrade tiers

re-balancing to mechanics and pricing

quality of life navigation and UI feedback
